messages.title: Want to change Britain's Future?
messages.content: The Lib Dems are fighting to get the best for Britain. That means staying in the single market to protect jobs - and fighting for an open and tolerant society. What the other parties don't want to give you a say, the Liberal Democrats are demanding that the final say on any Brexit deal. This is your chance to change the direction of the country. Use your vote to change Britain's future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems are the only party with a costed plan to give our NHS the full investment it needs.
If re-elected on June 8th, Julian Huppert will fight to stop a damaging Brexit and deliver the investment our NHS and schools desperately need.

issues.brexitEurope: Lib Dems are the anti-Brexit, Remain party. We should have the final say on any Brexit deal.
issues.health: The Conservatives have cut our NHS to breaking point. Delivers an extra £6bn a year to save our NHS.

community.content: Liberal Democrats are fighting to change Britain's future.

leaflet.personalStatement: Like many people I've spoken to, I am deeply concerned about the direction our country is heading under this extreme Conservative government. Brexit and severe cuts to our already underfunded NHS and schools are leaving many fearful for their future. But it doesn't have to be that way.

contactInformation.address: 15 Ronald Rolph Court, Wadloes Road, Cambridge CB5 8PX

endorsements.endorsement: Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit

quotes.text: Labour's leading Brexiteer explains why it MUST be a 'hard' Brexit for Britain.
Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us on Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition.
Labour's view, in many essentials, is indistinguishable from the prime minister's hard Brexit

images.caption: Millions are demanding change. Will you join them?

examples: Delivers an extra £6bn a year to save our NHS.
The Lib Dems are fighting to get the best for Britain.
The Lib Dems are the only party with a costed plan to give our NHS the full investment it needs.
Many lifelong Labour supporters have told me how dismayed they are at Jeremy Corbyn’s pro-Brexit stance.
Julian Huppert will fight day in, day out to stop a damaging Brexit and deliver the investment our NHS and schools desperately need.
Millions are demanding change. Will you join them?
Delivers an extra £6bn a year to save our NHS.
Lib Dems are the anti-Brexit, Remain party. We should have the final say on any Brexit deal.
Millions are demanding change. Will you join them?
Labour’s view, in many essentials, is indistinguishable from the prime minister’s hard Brexit.
Only the Lib Dems can stop hard Brexit
The Conservatives have cut our NHS to breaking point.
Jeremy Corbyn's Labour voted with UKIP in Parliament to support a hard Brexit. They have given the Conservatives an easy ride to pursue the most extreme and divisive Brexit possible.
